Title: Otoko wa tsurai yo: Haikei, Kuruma Torajiro sama
Actors: Kiyoshi Atsumi, Chieko Baisho, Hidetaka Yoshioka
Plot: Mitsuo, unhappy in his new job as a shoe salesman, is invited to a festival and is introduced to a friend's sister. Tora-san meanwhile helps an injured housewife on her yearly vacation.
